text: The Fiji men's national field hockey team represents Fiji in international field hockey competitions and is controlled by the Fiji Hockey Federation. ==Results== ===Hockey World League=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=9|Hockey World League record |- !Season !Position !Round ! ! ! * ! ! ! |- |rowspan=2|2012–13||rowspan=2|32nd of 33 |Round 1||2||2||0||0||24||2 |- |Round 2||5||0||0||5||8||48 |- |rowspan=2|2014–15||rowspan=2|Unranked |Round 1||2||2||0||0||21||3 |- |Round 2||colspan=6|Withdrew |- |rowspan=2|2016–17||rowspan=2|36th of 36 |Round 1||8||7||1||0||66||13 |- |Round 2||6||0||0||6||7||56 |- !Total||32nd (1x)||Round 2 (2x)||23||11||1||11||126||122 |} :*Draws include knockout matches decided on a penalty shoot-out. ===Pacific Games=== *1979 - 1st place *2015 - 1st place ===Oceania Cup=== *2005 – 3rd place *2015 – 3rd place ==See also== *Fiji women's national field hockey team ==References== Category:Oceanian men's national field hockey teams Field hockey National team Category:Men's sport in Fiji
title: Fiji men's national field hockey team
